title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 319: Featuring Johnny Gaudreau + Ryan Callahan
description:
On Episode 319 of Spittinâ€™ Chiclets, we are joined by Johnny Gaudreau and Ryan Callahan. Johnny joined (41:41) to talk about this season, playing with Matthew Tkachuk, the rumor Biz started about him and a bunch more. The guys also breakdown all of the NHL news in each division then hear from former NY Rangers captain Ryan Callahan. Cally joined (1:41:06) to discuss his time in NYC and playing for Torts, the move to Tampa, post career and tons more. The boys wrap up talking some soccer, Rough n Rowdy, the Stock Market and more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
